attribs.current:
[[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]][[4d6d1]]

These numbers may be arranged in any order.
If you dont like these stats you may do 27-point buy with this calculator: http://1-dot-encounter-planner.appspot.com/point-buy-calculator.html

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LCC8zXWnXUzinvvkxqo_description
attribs.current:
Make a token on http://rolladvantage.com/tokenstamp/ upload the token as your character image, and change the character name with this format:

PC Name (Game ID)

This is so the character can be assigned to you and a token can be made even while you are offline. if you fail to follow these instructions the character will eventually get deleted.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: I face problems head-on. A simple, direct solution is the best path to success.

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: Responsibility. I do what I must and obey just authority. (Lawful)

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: Someone saved my life on the battlefield. To this day, I will never leave a friend behind.

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: I obey the law, even if the law causes misery.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbhrW5qsVLBT0G82J1_itemcontent
attribs.current: Made of interlocking metal rings, chain mail includes a layer of quilted fabric worn underneath the mail to prevent chafing and to cushion the impact of blows. The suit includes gauntlets.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbi-Uw6-1V5QiDgytu_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 2d6, Damage Type: Slashing

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbiLyVKiyFkZB0Uy2f_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Melee Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Slashing, Alternate Damage Type: 1d10

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbiS1p7sTrO7KtvOSM_itemcontent
attribs.current:
Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

If you use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a melee attack, you treat the weapon as an improvised weapon (see "Improvised Weapons" later in the section). A sling must be loaded to deal any damage when used in this way.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbiS1p7sTrO7KtvOSM_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Ranged Weapon, Damage: 1d8, Damage Type: Piercing, Range: 80/320

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbiTkxMzXtf1oPjQr0_itemcontent
attribs.current: Ammunition: You can use a weapon that has the ammunition property to make a ranged attack only if you have ammunition to fire from the weapon. Each time you attack with the weapon, you expend one piece of ammunition. Drawing the ammunition from a quiver, case, or other container is part of the attack. At the end of the battle, you can recover half your expended ammunition by taking a minute to search the battlefield.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbiUMeQ1iBjyOQG6pQ_itemcontent
attribs.current: This wooden case can hold up to twenty crossbow bolts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbiaAGXFJzO86w4Saj_itemcontent
attribs.current: A backpack can hold one cubic foot or 30 pounds of gear. You can also strap items, such as a bedroll or a coil of rope, to the outside of a backpack.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbicqZTaOLMaPjf0yS_itemcontent
attribs.current: This tin box contains a cup and simple cutlery. The box clamps together, and one side can be used as a cooking pan and the other as a plate or shallow bowl.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbidoYA1wtJzlv9oFC_itemcontent
attribs.current: This small container holds flint, fire steel, and tinder (usually dry cloth soaked in light oil) used to kindle a fire. Using it to light a torch - or anything else with abundant, exposed fuel - takes an action. Lighting any other fire takes 1 minute.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbif-CaBLYiIaIkRgt_itemcontent
attribs.current: A torch burns for 1 hour, providing bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light for an additional 20 feet. If you make a melee attack with a burning torch and hit, it deals 1 fire damage.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbif-CaBLYiIaIkRgt_itemmodifiers
attribs.current: Item Type: Adventuring Gear, Damage: 1, Damage Type: Fire, Range: 20/40

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbig1VG2DbkucDF1Ub_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rations consist of dry foods suitable for extended travel, including jerky, dried fruit, hardtack, and nuts.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbihCMJJy1ysKfrU6N_itemcontent
attribs.current: Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbijL3x1BeRYGvQlQ4_itemcontent
attribs.current: A waterskin can hold up to 4 pints of liquid.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LKbj-7-2aAeHBNRcGp9_description
attribs.current:
Ability Scores: Str +1; Dex +1; Con +1; Int +1; Wis +1; Cha +1

Size: Medium

Speed: 30ft.

Age. Humans reach adulthood in their late teens and live less than a century.

Alignment. Humans tend toward no particular alignment. The best and the worst are found among them.

Size. Humans vary widely in height and build, from barely 5 feet to well over 6 feet tall. Regardless of your position in that range, your size is Medium.

Languages. You can speak, read, and write Common and one extra language of your choice. Humans typically learn the languages of other peoples they deal with, including obscure dialects. They are fond of sprinkling their speech with words borrowed from other tongues: Orc curses, Elvish musical expressions, Dwarvish military phrases, and so on.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LKbjlcUwZHlocBfbhro_description
attribs.current: While you are wearing armor, you gain a +1 bonus to AC.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LKbjx-tqvKJ-grSCLn5_description
attribs.current:
You have a limited well of stamina that you can draw on to protect yourself from harm. On your turn, you can use a bonus action to regain hit points equal to 1d10 + your fighter level.

Once you use this feature, you must finish a short or long rest before you can use it again.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbkXciqeP6rHL5F8py_itemcontent
attribs.current: These metal restraints can bind a Small or Medium creature. Escaping the manacles requires a successful DC 20 Dexterity check. Breaking them requires a successful DC 20 Strength check. Each set of manacles comes with one key. Without the key, a creature proficient with thieves' tools can pick the manacles' lock with a successful DC 15 Dexterity check. Manacles have 15 hit points.

attribs.name: repeating_inventory_-LKbkgPdQxVbGbKfZJYZ_itemcontent
attribs.current:
If you have proficiency with a given musical instrument, you can add your proficiency bonus to any ability checks you make to play music with the instrument.

A bard can use a musical instrument as a spellcasting focus, substituting it for any material component that does not list a cost.

Each type of musical instrument requires a separate proficiency.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LKbkt5Y9ZFwc7JcZsWp_description
attribs.current: Your experience in enforcing the law, and dealing with lawbreakers, gives you a feel for local laws and criminals. You can easily find the local outpost of the watch or a similar organization, and just as easily pick out the dens of criminal activity in a community, although you're more likely to be welcome in the former locations rather than the latter.

attribs.name: allies_and_organizations
attribs.current: Former gate commander in the city of Bordeaux, now transferred following the debacle during giant's siege.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LbAd0yR7GwWc1dUh5d4_description
attribs.current: Beginning when you choose this archetype at 3rd level, your weapon attacks score a critical hit on a roll of 19 or 20.

attribs.name: repeating_traits_-LcSlP3t0FyNS-LkAWQ-_description
attribs.current:
On your turn, when you score a critical hit with a melee weapon or reduce a creature to 0 hit points with one, you can make one melee weapon attack as a bonus action.
Before you make a melee attack with a heavy weapon with which you are proficient, you can choose to take a -5 penalty to the attack roll. If you do so and the attack hits, it deals +10 damage.
